title.title: Hello World!!!
title.welcome: Welcome to the main page of this project.
title.desc1: In this project I'm going to make tests of React, Material UI, Framer Motion and more.
title.desc2: This is to be able to learn more about the functioning and behavior of certain components in an interactive way, playing with the elements and animations that I can use.

calculator.title: Calculator
calculator.desc: This mini project shows a functional calculator.
